title: Tomato Seedling Potting: How to Repot for Thriving Growth!

tasks.task: Potting on tomatoes in the greenhouse.
subtasks: Position tomato seedlings deep in cell trays to promote root growth.
Label yogurt pots for gifting tomato seedlings in the community.
Apply patio cleaner and water to the patio.
Use the pressure washer to remove dirt and moss.

tasks.task: Potting on tomatoes in the greenhouse.**
subtasks: ** Fill cell trays with compost (e.g., Melcote silver).
** Position tomato seedlings deeply in the cell trays to encourage root growth.
** Label yogurt pots for community seedling distribution, ensuring each variety is identified.
** Prepare the pressure washer (using a double-power nozzle from Screw Fix) with a hose (noted from their previous "horse pipe" issues).
** Apply patio cleaner and allow it to take effect (they previously used a patio cleaner needing time to work).
** Use the pressure washer to clean the patio, addressing dirt and moss accumulation, possibly requiring brushing in areas.
